message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal, and I think it's fair considering the value it offers. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $10,000.

Bob, while I appreciate your offer, $10,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price.  How about $12,000? This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a good deal for both of us.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product and the negotiations we've had, I would like to counteroffer at $11,500.
Bob, I appreciate you coming up in your offer, but I'm still not comfortable at $11,500.  Let's meet in the middle at $12,000.  This is my final offer before I consider selling to another buyer.
I see your point, Alice. I am willing to pay $11,750 for the product.
Bob, I'm starting to run out of time here. $11,750 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to go down to $12,000 one last time. If you don't accept this offer, I'll have to move on to another buyer.
Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to pay $11,875 for the product.
